about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks the Matariki Holiday Mission, REPOPULATION: Research, tasking you with helping introduce a new flightless bird species to Icarus. It will have you retrieving and incubating an egg while protecting it from predators.

This mission is bonus content for owners of the Icarus: Styx Expansion pack.
detailed_description:
THIS SUPPORTS OUR PROJECT

Our DLC was made to provide a way for those who enjoy the project to further support it, and in return receive some simple new content. This content is not essential for the game. Consider purchasing this if you want to further provide financial support to the development of Icarus.


FREE WITH EXPANSION

This DLC is provided for free to those who purchase the STYX Expansion DLC and utilizes content introduced in the Matariki update which introduces the Kiwi to Icarus.


About the Game

This DLC unlocks the Matariki Holiday Mission, REPOPULATION: Research, tasking you with helping introduce a new flightless bird species to Icarus. It will have you retrieving and incubating an egg while protecting it from predators. This mission is bonus content for owners of the Icarus: Styx Expansion pack.
name: Icarus: Matariki Mission

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Unlocks the Matariki Mission, tasking you with helping introduce a new flightless bird species to Icarus. It will have you retrieving and incubating an egg while protecting it from predators.
